title: The FBI Is Hunting a New Domestic Terror Threat: Abortion Rights Activists
description:
After GOP pressure, FBI abortion “terrorism” investigations increased tenfold, government data shows.

The post The FBI Is Hunting a New Domestic Terror Threat: Abortion Rights Activists appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The FBI Groomed a 16-Year-Old With “Brain Development Issues” to Become a Terrorist
description:
An undercover FBI agent befriended the teenager online. When he turned 18, he was arrested for supporting ISIS.

The post The FBI Groomed a 16-Year-Old With “Brain Development Issues” to Become a Terrorist appeared first on The Intercept.
